LanguageData.DesignatorRemovePlumbingDesc: Designate sections of a pipe type for deconstruction
LanguageData.RemoveSewageDesc: Remove sewage from the ground and place it into barrels
LanguageData.BlockedSewageDesc: Sewage has built up around the drain hole and is blocking the outlet.\n\nBuild more outlets or add a septic tank to create a buffer and reduce pressure on the outlets.
LanguageData.LowWaterTempDesc: The water temperature in this tank is too low, colonists expecting to use hot water may get annoyed.\n\nTurn on boilers, increase the heating capacity or add another hot water tank.
LanguageData.WellNeedsWater: Must be placed over a cell with ground water.
LanguageData.AssigningRequiresRoom: The fixture must be inside a room to restrict it
LanguageData.AssigningRequiresBladderNeed: Assigning requires bladder need, {0} doesn't have it
LanguageData.LetterBlockedDrain: A drain has become blocked, a cleaner must clean the blockage.
LanguageData.ContaminationAlertDesc:
A water source is so polluted that there is a risk it will contaminate your water storage towers

Sources of contamination:
{0} 

Either remove the sources of contamination, or add a water treatment system which will also clean contaminated water towers.
LanguageData.ContaminatiedTowerAlertDesc: A water tower has become polluted, this poses a serious risk to the health of your colonists! Move your water towers, drain them, or build a water treatment system
LanguageData.MessageHygieneDisease: {0} has contracted {1} from dirty water and bad hygiene
LanguageData.MessageWaterDisease: {0} has contracted {1} from dirty water or not washing their hands
LanguageData.CommandFixtureSetAsMedicalDesc: Limit this fixture to patients only
LanguageData.ConnectFixturesToBedDesc: Connect the fixtures to a nearby bed so they inherit the ownership
LanguageData.OverrideThermostatDesc: Force the boiler to run continuously
LanguageData.MustPlaceFreezerWithFreeSpaces: Exhaust vents must be kept clear!
LanguageData.HotWaterTankUseThermostatDesc: Allow this hot water tank to control connected boilers
LanguageData.CommandDesignateOpenCloseValveDesc: Toggle the valve open or closed
LanguageData.DrainTankDesc: Drain the tank and remove contamination
LanguageData.DrainSepticTankDesc: Set the level at which fecal sludge should be emptied into barrels, which can be moved and knocked over, burned, or turned into biosolids
LanguageData.KickOverDesc: Spill this barrel of sewage onto the ground
LanguageData.QuitToMenuToChange: Quit to main menu to change
LanguageData.RimefellerLinkTip: Enable water usage on crackers and refiners in Rimefeller
LanguageData.RimatomicsLinkTip: Enable water usage on cooling towers in Rimatomics
LanguageData.OverrideNeedSettingsTip: Manually disable needs by body type, race, or active hediff
LanguageData.PrisonersGetNeedsTip: If prisoners will get the needs
LanguageData.HospitalityGuestsGetNeedsTip: If guests should get the needs
LanguageData.PrivacyChecksTip: Colonists care about privacy when bathing or using toilets
LanguageData.CoolingEfficiencyTip: Should high temperature affect cooling efficiency like standard AC
LanguageData.DisableNeedsTip: Disable the needs entirely, overrides all other settings
LanguageData.PetsGetBladderTip: If pets will get the bladder need
LanguageData.WildAnimalsGetBladderTip: If all wild animals will get the bladder need
LanguageData.ThirstNeedTip: Enable a basic thirst need on all colonists with the bladder need
LanguageData.FertilizerVisibleTip: If the fertilizer grid should be visible
LanguageData.AllowNonHumanTip: Allow the needs on non human colonists, you can disable specific beings with the override settings
LanguageData.StripWhileWashingTip: Strip clothes while washing, disable if needed to fix mod conflicts
